name: Spellweaver (itch) (Benilde GameDev)
description:
Note:
Best with pen tablet

Spell Weaver is an Action FPS gesture game wherein the player weaves runes and/or spells to attack, defend, buff, summon, or unlock simple puzzles to clear dungeons, and defend villages/settlements.

Year and Term of Capstone:
Capstone2, 2nd Term, Academic Year 2016-2017

Team members:
Lim, Jebbrich
Magtoto, Michael
Salazar, Ian Michael
Sio, Levin
Tan, Dave Angelo

Recognition:
Innovation Representative - GameOn! 2017
Oct 2017 • Game Developers Association of the Philippines
